channel.title: Client codeing help plz
channel.description:
ty for looking.
first question how can i add a model at mmy cleint for a gfx suck as veng lol...ive been haveing trouble with my veng and the cleint i downloaded has the models erased so idk wut to do.
im trying to add vengeance to my server and i have it working just ned the correct gfx thingo from the cleint here is wut i have:
[code]case 422: /* gfx ID veng */ originalDataID = 354; // you can change this , this id makes it spin ;) gfx.anInt405 = 1828; /* Model ID 16828*/ break; case 642: /* gfx ID veng */ originalDataID = 342; // you can change this , this id makes it spin ;) gfx.anInt405 = 1828; /* Model ID 16828*/ break;[/code]
thats modle dose not exist and when i do veng it looks like a sigh above there heal lol so how can i make that look like a skull lol im a noob i know but i need to know
ps: can som1 give me a link for veng modle xD...add my msn invalidmage@hotmail.com if u cvan take the time to help me out ty
